Text: Didn't mean to give the impression it is inaccessable. Just meant it is proper thoughtful sci-fi rather than regular family type stuff.It's different but intriguing and....Yes GREAT stuff :)
its good. and Lucas made a first version as a schoolproject. so this one is a bigger budget remake. (so the whole revisionistic complaint most hav after StarWars is nothing new to him at all.. :)

Is this the Director's Cut or the original?
It must be the director's cut, I don't think the original version was ever released on DVD.
how do I burn this? I tried cloneDVD, but it didn't work

I'm pretty sure it's the DVD version (directors cut). I loved the original, this one has too much cgi put into it and it's also cut a little different which I don't like. Still quality is awsome as are all of Lucas' dvd's... besides American Graffitti. If you love sci-fi this is a must, imho Lucas' best.
